description: Use Zoom to easily schedule, join, manage, and customize meetings and calls from Gmail and Google Calendar.Help your organization meet happy with the Zoom Google Workspace add-on for Gmail and Google Calendar. With the add-on, you can easily deploy and install the Zoom integration for Google Workspace to your whole organization with a few simple steps.Streamline how your team schedules, starts, and manages their meetings directly from Gmail and Google Calendar. Simplify your scheduling process with Zoom Meeting details added to your Google Calendar invitations with 1-click. Generate meaningful meeting details by automatically adding the topic, attendees, and attachments based on subject, recipients, and sent documents. And customize meeting options like join with video on, join with audio muted, join before host, and other options to help you host your meetings your way.You can also place Zoom Phone calls directly within your Google email or Google Calendar workspace. Simply click on the Zoom icon on the right side of the screen and search for the contact you wish to call or use the dialpad. You can even call the list of attendees for a specific meeting or event by selecting the meeting or event from your calendar and the contact information for the attendee list will populate under the Call Contacts list.

This app is mainly used for Azure Provisioning authentication. Azure provisioning is used for querying, creating, updating, and deleting four types of API requests, quickly and conveniently synchronising User/Group information in Azure to the Zoom. At the same time, Azure also monitors data changes for scheduled synchronisation to ensure that the data in the Zoom is always consistent with the latest data in Azure

Otter.ai integrates with Zoom to record audio and provide interactive transcripts in real time, so everyone can focus on the discussion. Instantly see the notes in your internet browser.This integration includes two capabilities:Live Notes: All meeting participants can open the Otter.ai Live Transcript, through  the LIVE menu at the top of the Zoom window. The transcript will open in your internet browser. Sign into Otter.ai to highlight, comment, and add photos to the live meeting notes. Post-Meeting Transcription: Otter.ai will automatically sync and transcribe your Zoom cloud recordingsWorks with the following Zoom plans: Pro, Business, and EnterpriseWorks with the following Otter.ai plans:  Business and EnterpriseGreat for working professionals, hybrid teams, and students!To set up, please follow the instructions at https://blog.otter.ai/zoomTo access even more Otter.ai meeting and collaboration features, please visit https://otter.ai

Works with: ZoomWhen Gong and Zoom are connected, any meeting scheduled within G Suite or Office 365 is recorded, transcribed and analyzed to provide you with insights to improve sales performance, and keep on top of your game.Gong captures every customer call, web conference, and email. You can finally see how deals are progressing and what you could be doing better. The game isn't about having more conversations — it's about having better ones.Team selling wins more deals. Gong helps your team collaborate, provide feedback, and work together as a lean mean selling machine. Gong uses your team stats and industry benchmarks, sprinkles some AI dust, and shows you what works.And there's more. Want to know when a competitor came up in a call? Or how a discount request was handled?Just ask. Gong will tell you. Want to see the timeline of all your conversations with a customer? Gong has all the details.Using Gong for G Suite to schedule a meeting with a Gong consent page, using a unique Zoom meeting ID.Use Zoom's native cloud recording for capturing Zoom meetings to be analyzed by Gong

Integrate with HubSpot meetingsAutomatically send dial-in and conference call details to your HubSpot prospects. Turn every meeting booked in your HubSpot CRM into a Zoom meeting.Promote your Zoom webinars with HubSpot workflowsWhen someone registers for a Zoom webinar, they're created as a contact in HubSpot. Use HubSpot workflows to send them automated event reminders, follow-up emails, and more.Track Zoom webinar attendance and Recordings in HubSpot CRMCreate lists and views in the HubSpot CRM based on Zoom webinar activities. Use contact properties to see when contacts register and attend webinars and how long they typically stay. View zoom recordings directly on the contact timeline.

Automatically transfer of all of your Zoom Cloud recording content to Kaltura, both from Zoom meetings and webinars. Kaltura provides live and on-demand video SaaS solutions to thousands of organizations around the world, engaging hundreds of millions of viewers at home, at work, and at school.For Enterprises, Kaltura offers a wide array of video solutions that are changing the way companies approach training, collaboration, communication, marketing, and sales.For Education Institutions, Kaltura transforms the classroom with video solutions for teaching and learning, in the lecture hall and beyond.For Media, Pay-TV Providers, and Telecom companies, Kaltura provides a robust Cloud TV Platform to launch and operate a next-generation OTT-TV service over the internet.For Developers, Kaltura has created a Video Platform-as-a-Service, enabling organizations to create any video solution and workflow, whether standalone or tightly integrated. With the Kaltura-Zoom integration, automatically transfer all Zoom cloud recordings to Kaltura, including Zoom Webinar recordings. Recordings will be available for each user under their My Media library, enabling users to manage, share, and collaborate across Kaltura’s products and integrations. In addition, admins can define a category in Kaltura Management Console associated with all Zoom recordings. All Zoom recordings uploaded to Kaltura can be found under this category for easy management.

The LTI Pro app integrates Zoom Video Conferencing into learning management systems (LMS) that support the LTI 1.1.1 standard.  LTI Pro has been successfully integrated into Blackboard, Canvas, Desire2Learn, Moodle, Sakai and other LMS platforms.Instructors can use the the LTI Pro app to:Schedule and start Zoom meetings to support distance learning, office hours, study groups and lecture capture, access their cloud recordingsStudents can use LTI Pro to:Join Zoom meetings to remotely attend classes, office hours and study groups, view recordings of previous classesPlease refer to https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/sections/4422131421581 for installation instructions and to review release notes.

🚀 Get instant access to Fathom for FREE at https://fathom.video 🚀Fathom is a free app that records, transcribes, and summarizes your Zoom, Google Meet or Microsoft Teams calls so you can focus on the conversation instead of taking notes.With a paid Zoom One Pro, Zoom One Business, or Zoom One Business Plus subscription, you unlock unlimited recording, transcription, and AI summaries with Zoom curated Essential Apps. Terms apply.💥 Instant Access to Fully Transcribed & Summarized RecordingsNo more waiting after your calls for the recording! Jump directly to highlights & action items.🤖 Auto-Generated Call SummariesTurn a 30 min call into a 1 min read! Copy your summaries into Google Doc, Notion, or Word with a single click.🔥 Updates Salesforce & Hubspot AutomaticallyNo more post-call data entry! Fathom will log your call and its summary into your CRM.🙏 Easily Share HighlightsShow don't tell! Fathom makes it easy to share key passages of your customer calls or meetings with colleagues. 🔍 Search Across Calls & TranscriptsGetting on a follow-up call and don’t remember where you left off? Boss asking you if anyone’s brought up a certain competitor recently? Fathom’s got you covered.

Panopto is a secure video portal for your Zoom recordings. It enables you to share recordings with people who couldn’t attend the meeting, and recall relevant moments from any meeting.With Panopto, Zoom administrators get more control over recording permissions. Meeting hosts benefit from simplified sharing, a video editor, and viewing analytics. And participants get a more interactive and engaging playback experience. Zoom AdminsCentralize your recordings in a secure repository with unlimited storage.Use SSO to simplify access management and reduce support costs.Audit viewing activity to ensure internal and regulatory compliance.Organize videos by topic, and curate videos for the portal homepage. Brand the video portal to reflect your corporate identity.Meeting HostsOrganize all your recordings in an easy-to-use portal.Automatically share your recordings with meeting participants, and selectively share with specific people and groups.Edit your recordings to remove confidential information and highlight important moments. Use video analytics to see who watched each recording.Securely embed recordings for playback in other portals, CMSs, and LMSs. Request ADA Section 508-compliant transcriptions.Meeting ParticipantsSearch across all your recordings and instantly fast-forward to any word spoken or shown on-screen.Watch recordings in an immersive video player that shows speakers and on-screen content side-by-side in high definition.Bookmark key moments in videos to easily recall important information.Discuss relevant topics after the meeting using threaded discussions.Control playback speed for a more personalized viewing experience.

The Zoom Connector for the YuJa Enterprise Video Platform enables organizations to sync their Zoom meetings recordings into their cloud-hosted YuJa system. Sync-ed recordings are automatically captioned and indexed for improved search-inside-video capabilities.

Zscaler Digital Experience Integration allows you to monitor actual one-to-one calls or meetings among two or more participants in a configured Zoom tenant. The ZDX Score for Call Quality can reflect either a Mean Opinion Score (MOS) average, or metric thresholds for latency, jitter, and packet loss. Call Quality works in parallel with ZDX cloud path probes and device metrics and events to help you identify issues that are unique to a device or the network.Call Quality data is retrieved using the Zoom API, and data is captured in real time as a meeting is in progress. User and device information garnered from the API for call participants is mapped to ZDX users and devices.

Integrate Zoom with Rippling’s unified employee management solution in order to manage user accounts, and enable Single Sign-on (via SAML) for your employees. The integration includes the following capabilities:Creating user accountsRemoving user accountsAttributing user types based on department, role, or other employee data.Single Sign-on  access via their employee home(SAML)About RipplingRippling is the first way for businesses to manage their HR & IT — from payroll and benefits, to employee computers and apps — all in one, modern system.In just 90-seconds, a company can set up (or disable) an employee’s payroll, health insurance, work computer, and third-party apps, like Gmail, Microsoft Office, and Slack. It’s the only platform that truly unifies every employee system, and automates all of the administrative work.

Each SaaS platform has a set of security configurations and native controlsSecuring the enterprise data and users across these systems in a streamlined and consistent way is becoming ever challenging, with an unprecedented rate of change in the corporate environment, changes made by the SaaS platforms themselves and dramatic changes in the macro-environment (e.g. WFH)Adaptive Shield provide:Aggregating and monitoring all users (including 3rd party entities) across Zoom platform, their level of privileged access and exposureStacking Zoom security posture against compliance frameworks (e.g. ISO 27001, SOC 2) and best practices (NIST, CIS) in an automated wayProviding a prioritized and actionable remediation plan.Alerting on security configuration drifts as soon as they occur, allowing an immediate action

Zylo is the leading SaaS management platform. With cloud investment soaring and decentralized SaaS spend proliferating, enterprises struggle to effectively manage their subscription software. Zylo discovers all SaaS purchases across your company to provide visibility to: spend, app engagement, renewals, and more to create a system of record for your Software. The Zoom integration allows you to track meeting and engagement metrics to help you optimize your licenses –Meetings hostedEngagement metricsWebinar licenses and statsUpcoming meetingsThe Zylo integration allows you to make smart decisions to ensure your users have the right license.

Onna enables organizations to rapidly identify, defensibly collect, archive and search data from Zoom and other popular cloud applications in one centralized place. We unify otherwise fragmented data, process it to extract meaning and knowledge and make it easy to find what’s needed fast to support eDiscovery, knowledge management, information governance and more. Onna integrates with Zoom's API to extract meeting and chat data including; meeting audio and video recordings, meeting transcripts (Business or Enterprise account needed), 1:1, group, and channel chat messages, files, images, code snippets and emojis. This integration requires an Onna license and API access. You can learn more about Onna’s Zoom integration by visiting our Help Center (https://support.onna.com/en/articles/4242239-how-to-collect-from-zoom)

appName: Meeting Recaps, Transcripts, Recording from Read
description:
Instant meeting recaps from Read AI delivers an automated summary, topics discussed, action items, key questions, coaching tips and recommendations after every Zoom meeting.
Read is the ultimate AI app for hybrid meetings where you can see real-time engagement + sentiment scores, a meeting timer, talk time, word per minute, and coaching tips all in one place. When the meeting is over, you'll get a comprehensive report with a transcript, audio + video playback, and AI-driven recommendations.

Now, with a paid Zoom One Pro, Zoom One Business or Zoom One Business Plus subscription, you get access to premium features and more with Zoom curated Essential Apps. Terms apply.Real-TimeEngagement + Sentiment Scores: Interest and emotions metricsImmersive Mode: AR applied to participantsMeeting Timer: Start and end meetings on timeTalk Time: Ensure an inclusive conversationWords Per Minute + Filler Words: Coaching to improve the conversation in the momentNotepad: Add your own notes to the meeting for your eyes only with time stampsPost-MeetingMeeting Recaps: After every meeting receive a written meeting summary, list of topics, action items, and key questions.Meeting Report: A robust set of meeting metrics and analyticsTranscription: Automated summary, topics, notes, action items, questionsFor You: Summary and topic discovery across your meetingsMeeting Playback: Audio and video playback w/ navigation based on metricsCoaching:  AI generated tips for better pacing, fewer filler words, and less interruptionsRecommendations: AI recommendations for fewer, better meetingsAs part of Essential Apps receive premium features with real-time and advanced meeting metrics along with team workspace and benchmarks. Learn more at read.ai

Take your Zoom deployment to the next level with insights to improve collaboration experience and business outcomes.Vyopta’s collaboration insights provide: Detailed Zoom User information, Zoom Room status & analytics, Conference Room Connector license utilizationComplete visibility across hybrid work modes, including remote and in-office collaborationSingle-pane-of-glass across Zoom’s collaboration portfolio and mixed-vendor UC environmentsUser tagging for customized, business-relevant reports (ex. by VIPs, by business unit, by department, by location, and more)Ability to proactively identify & quickly troubleshoot issues, with sophisticated alerting capabilities and dashboardsIntuitive workflows and Service Desk integration, allowing IT and UC staff use Vyopta with minimal training to resolve issues before they escalate.Vyopta’s CPM Monitoring® and CPM Analytics® modules help to proactively identify risks, reduce troubleshooting time, accurately diagnose issues, improve Zoom Meetings adoption, and intelligently optimize operational planning and ROI. This solution is intended for UC operations staff, UC architects, IT Managers, and IT Help Desk staff.If you have a Premium Events Subscription for Zoom, with webhook access to "Meeting Participant QoS" and "Meeting Participant Advanced Data" event you can use the "Vyopta CPM for Zoom Webhooks" app with improved real time data collection.
To configure this integration, please create a Vyopta Account first at https://my.vyopta.com/

Zoom’s HIPAA/PIPEDA compliant Epic app empowers patients, physicians and other healthcare professionals to communicate face-to-face with Zoom video  during Epic appointment visits.For Physicians:Be notified via Hyperspace when a patient has joined the scheduled video appointmentStart Zoom video visits directly from Hyperspace while continuing to document case notes in EpicInvite additional participants to the video visitFor Patients:Launch Zoom from MyChart Patient portal on personal computer or mobile deviceReceive customized message when joining the video visit before the providerRejoin the video visit even after dropping out as long as the provider is still in the sessionSee the integration in action (requires login credentials for Epic UserWeb Portal).To get started, talk to your Epic ambulatory TS or contact Zoom.

AppOmni secures the applications that power the enterprise - including Zoom!AppOmni gives your Security, Compliance, and IT teams instant visibility and management of your Zoom security posture.Using AppOmni, you can:Write security policies to continuously monitor over 100 Account, Group, and User settings as well as over 75 Role and User privileges. Be alerted in your choice of systems when these policies are violated.Monitor and alert on normalized event data about Meeting Recording Activity, User Activity, Configuration Changes, Meeting and Webinars, and Zoom Rooms. This data can be delivered to your existing SIEM or SOC instantly.Automatically monitor compliance requirements for your company's use of Zoom against frameworks like ISO/IEC 27001, SOX, NIST CSF v1.1, and SOC2.

Meet Happy using Zoom's native integration with Salesforce! Supercharge your productivity by leveraging Zoom Meetings and Zoom Phone from your Salesforce environment.With a few clicks, you can start a Zoom Meeting with you contacts and record your conversation in your Salesforce activity history. Schedule or start a Zoom Webinar, add leads and contacts as registrants, and track participation as a part of that contact's details. Additionally, use the Zoom Phone dialer to start and manage your Zoom Phone calls, automatically log call activity, and pop contacts directly from the Salesforce interface into Zoom Phone.Close business faster:Seamlessly start a Zoom Meeting and track it in your Salesforce activity history.Easily manage your inbound and outbound sales calls with a soft Zoom Phone dialer.Efficiently take notes in the Zoom Phone dialer app during your sales call and add them to your Salesforce contact record.Automatically create Salesforce campaigns when Zoom Webinars are created.Automate syncing Zoom Webinar attendee information and webinar participation to contacts.Approve, deny, and cancel webinar registrations natively through Salesforce.Salesforce is the world's #1 CRM platform for businesses of all sizes. Compatible with Salesforce Professional, Enterprise, Unlimited, Force.com, Developer, and Performance editions.

Vymo is the Sales Acceleration Platform for over 200K users in 60+ global financial institutions such as AIA, FE Credit, Generali, and more.. It provides a unified window to all the information and services that sales executives, managers, and sales leaders need on the go, with data-driven playbooks to drive task prioritization and deal acceleration.Zoom’s native integration with Vymo allows you to log your Zoom calls as activities on the Vymo app and tag it against a lead or a customer/partner, without any manual intervention. It simplifies activity logging with quick note-taking & better planning of next steps arising from the meeting. Vymo correlates engagement activities from zoom this with sales effectiveness - goals achieved, incentives earned - to help understand winning patterns and areas of improvement. Additionally, Vymo’s deep learning models work on the vast pool of activity information to identify winning behaviours.With Zoom for Vymo, activity capture on Vymo now covers all Zoom engagements too. Quick-launch Zoom meetings from the Vymo assistantAuto-detect and log Zoom meetings with in-the-moment notesAuto-map participants to your leads, customers, or colleagues

When you connect your Zoom account with Calendly, video conferencing is made simple. Choosing Zoom as your event location will automatically create video conference details and save them to your Calendly event. Providing your invitees instant access to these details will save you time and help reduce meeting no-shows.Once an event is scheduled, the Zoom details will be automatically included in the confirmation notifications and calendar event sent to your invitees.With Calendly’s app for Zoom, you can:Automatically generate unique Zoom conference details for every meeting you schedule.Eliminate the need to manually enter or remember conferencing details for all your meetings.Automatically update meeting details in real time when rescheduling or canceling.

Our Modern Revenue Enablement Platform transforms traditional methods by illuminating field learning, delivering content and experiences for modern buyers, and uniting revenue teams for continuous improvement and growth. Trusted by nearly one million professionals in 65 countries, Allego offers a comprehensive app for learning, content, coaching, and virtual selling. We are chosen by a quarter of Dow Jones Industrial Average companies, 5 of the top 10 U.S. banks, 3 of the top 5 U.S. insurance companies, 4 of the top 5 global medical device companies, 6 of the top 10 U.S. wealth management firms, and 14 of the top 20 U.S. asset management companies.This app allows an administrator to link their Allego account to their Zoom account to automatically pull in recordings for all configured users of Allego for coaching & analysis.We also offer integrations for pulling Zoom meetings into Allego for users or Zoom Phone; please get in touch with your Customer Success Manager at Allego to provision these integrations on your account.

Do you need to schedule Zoom meetings or compose Zoom messages for different people? Chat Mate can handle all of that for you with ease. Chat Mate can perform your instructions given in plain English.Need help with getting the gist of recent Zoom messages? Chat Mate has you covered there too. Ask Chat Mate any question related to message content visible to you, and it will provide you with insightful and informative answers in brief.With the ability to schedule meetings and send bulk messages, Chat Mate leverages Chat GPT and Zoom API capabilities. This is an interactive chatbot app subject to errors.For more information reach us at info@codimite.com!

Streamline your workflow and communications with the Zoom integrations for Slack. Start a Zoom Meeting directly in a Slack channel or group message using the /zoom slash command.  Know when someone joins or leaves, get a meeting summary and share the meeting recording. Additionally, use the /zoom call or dedicated Zoom Phone button to dial out to your chosen contact via Zoom Phone.Start or join Zoom Meetings with one clickSee real-time how long the Zoom Meeting has been runningKeep an eye on who joins or leaves your Zoom MeetingSee the duration and participant summary for your Zoom Meeting after it endsShare Zoom Meeting recordings from any Slack channel or group direct messageMake a Zoom Phone call from any Slack channel or group direct messageEasily send a Zoom Whiteboard with any Slack channel or direct message; users will see a preview of the whiteboard in the chat Whiteboard owners are notified of requests to access a Whiteboard and can grant access to others in the chat directly﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿The Zoom integration for Slack can be installed individually by the Slack user with a Zoom account or be deployed by the Zoom account admin to the whole organization with a few simple steps.Note: The first time you use the Zoom slash command in Slack, you will be asked to login to Zoom (if you are not already logged in) and approve the app's access to Zoom.

Chorus.ai is a Conversation Intelligence Platform that records, transcribes, and analyzes business conversations in real-time to coach reps on crushing their quota. Our unique focus on deals ensures that you analyze conversations, on-board and coach reps around pipeline, forecast, and revenue.   Chorus.ai can join all your online meetings, either pre-invited or unscheduled and record conversations and screen shares. If multiple people join from the same room, Chorus.ai identifies them as separate speakers for accurate attribution. Get high-accuracy transcripts as soon as you end your call and leverage them for email follow-ups as well as CRM updates. By integrating meeting data into Chorus and ZoomInfo’s platform, this app gives your go-to-market teams the information they need to connect with prospects and customers at the right time with the right message.  With Chorus.ai your conversation intelligence is closely linked to your pipeline, so you analyze conversations / rep performance and coach individuals / teams based on deals rather than just doing film reviews. Get started today to improve revenue growth and quota achievement with deal-based conversation intelligence.

DoControl provides automated and self-service tools to cloud-first organizations for monitoring, orchestrating and remediating data access across SaaS apps.We take a unique, customer-focused approach to the challenge of labor-intensive security risk management and data exfiltration prevention in Zoom.The DoControl solution provides foundational data access control policies to:Establish end-to-end visibility across all SaaS users and activitiesMonitor and control every identity and entity, both internal users and external collaboratorsRemediate the risk of sensitive Zoom files (video, audio, and text-based) being exfiltrated by deleting recordings or their associated text files from the cloudMitigate the risk of sensitive Zoom files (video, audio, and text-based) being over-exposed by changing their public sharing status to internal or non-shareable DoControl helps organizations of all sizes and types prevent data breaches in the most popular SaaS apps, and restore balance between security and business enablement. DoControl’s security workflows enable IT and security teams to address near-limitless use cases, through fully customizable and granular data access control policies. DoControl has built deep integrations with numerous business-critical SaaS apps including Zoom, Google Drive, Microsoft Office 365, Dropbox, Box, Slack, Salesforce, and many others.

Obsidian’s Zoom integration lets security teams monitor who is using Zoom and what they are doing in order to protect against inappropriate recording, oversharing, and suspicious Zoom usage. Security teams can detect and respond to poorly configured Zoom accounts, security incidents, and insider threats that involve Zoom in combination with other SaaS applications. Obsidian generates alerts related to a variety of risks and threats, including:App configurations that violate security best practicesUnexpected participants on a regular Zoom callMeetings recorded in sensitive environmentsMeetings created without passwordsSuspicious logins; e.g., unfamiliar devices and locations, and impossible travel where a user appears to be in distant locations in a short time frameThe Obsidian Cloud Detection and Response platform provides frictionless security for SaaS. Obsidian allows security teams to detect threats, remediate breaches, and harden security in SaaS apps by continuously aggregating  and analyzing data around user access and activity. Obsidian has built deep integrations with leading SaaS-based communication and collaboration platforms that organizations are increasingly relying on to get remote work done, such as Slack, G Suite, Microsoft Office 365, and now Zoom.

Fantastical integrates with Zoom to allow you to quickly create and attach Zoom meetings to your event invitations.This app allows you to connect your Zoom account to Fantastical for Mac. If you want to connect your Zoom account to Fantastical for iOS, please use the Fantastical for iOS app.Sign in to your Zoom account in Fantastical and you will be able to create Zoom meetings whenever you create an event in Fantastical. The Zoom meeting information, including URL, password, and dial-in phone numbers will automatically be added to the event notes, making it easy for everyone invited to join the meeting.Fantastical's Zoom integration is available for Mac, iOS, and iPadOS.

This Flexera SaaS Manager (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/fDR6bErKQVqDRGsRZBkokQ/information) Oauth Client App, which is used for the integration of Zoom Accounts with SaaS Manager in North America Production environment, we have also published the following different Oauth client Apps for different production environment and Zoom accounts.1. FSM - Tiered Accounts (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/mm3rwk2kRPipziK6mxfNog/information): Even this app is used for North America production environment, but for the Zoom accounts with tiered structure or Master Account feature enabled and multiple sub-accounts.2. SaaS Manager - EU (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/ZAluY80nTluo24q3HADIyw/information): This OAuth Client App is used for the EMEA region SaaS Manager production environment, and for the integrating the Zoom accounts without Master account feature enabled and no sub-accounts.3. FSM EU Tiered Accounts (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/95d6opvUSZa8p5y2QaUH3w/information): This OAuth client app is used for the EMEA region SaaS Manager production environment, and for integrating the Zoom accounts with Master account feature and multiple sub-accounts.4. SaaS Manager APAC (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/hITFZGbXSFGmxyyOdzC9Xg/information): This OAuth client app is used for the APAC region SaaS Production environment, and for the integrating the Zoom accounts without Master account feature and no sub-accounts.5. FSM APAC Tiered Account (https://marketplace.zoom.us/develop/apps/kmTiHI-dQKKn4C-P5WLZow/information): This OAuth client app is used for the APAC region SaaS Production environment, and for integrating the Zoom accounts with Master account feature and multiple sub-accounts.

Gong unlocks reality to help people and companies reach their full potential. The patented Gong Revenue Intelligence Platform™ empowers customer-facing teams to take advantage of their most valuable assets – customer interactions, which the Gong platform automatically captures and analyzes. Gong then delivers insights at scale, empowering revenue and go-to-market teams to determine the best actions for winning outcomes. Thousands of innovative companies like Morningstar Inc., Paychex, LinkedIn, Shopify, Slack, SproutSocial, Twilio, and Zillow trust Gong to power their customer reality. Gong is a private company headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area. For more information visit www.gong.io.

Proofpoint makes it easy to capture, manage and retain data from your content sources, including Zoom. Using the Zoom API, we capture business IM chat content and deliver it to your archive for e-discovery, compliance, and supervision.

This service is only available in Japanese.When ailead and Zoom Phone is connected, any meeting scheduled is recorded, transcribed, and analyzed to provide you with insights to improve sales performance.Team selling wins more deals. ailead helps your team collaborate, provide feedback, and work together. Get started today to improve revenue growth and quota achievement with conversation intelligence.

Zoom’s HIPAA/PIPEDA compliant Epic app empowers patients, physicians and other healthcare professionals to communicate face-to-face with Zoom video  during Epic appointment visits.For Physicians:Be notified via Hyperspace when a patient has joined the scheduled video appointmentStart Zoom video visits directly from Hyperspace while continuing to document case notes in EpicInvite additional participants to the video visitFor Patients:Launch Zoom from MyChart Patient portal on personal computer or mobile deviceReceive customized message when joining the video visit before the providerRejoin the video visit even after dropping out as long as the provider is still in the sessionSee the integration in action (requires login credentials for Epic UserWeb Portal)To get started, talk to your Epic ambulatory TS or contact Zoom .

Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, collaboration, chat, and webinars across mobile devices, desktops, telephones, and room systems. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is headquartered in San Jose, California. Enhance your HubSpot experience and streamline your workflows by installing the Zoom Phone integration. FeaturesClick to CallClick to dial phone numbers with HubSpotOr, manually enter a number within the softphone in ServiceNowAutomatic Call LoggingAutomatically log calls to HubSpot and capture meaningful data for your organization. Agents can leave notes, create tasks, and moreVoicemail/Recording accessible within logsAccess Voicemails and Recordings within the Call LogsSend and Receive SMSAbility to send and receive SMS within the softphone.Zoom Phone Call Quality and SecurityEnjoy the high call quality and security that are provided by Zoom Agents can leverage additional features within the Zoom Client

Fivetran provides fully managed data pipelines that can be set up with minimal configuration. The Zoom Connector By Fivetran uses Zoom API to sync data from customer's Zoom account to their warehouse on their behalf. The Zoom connector syncs data at regular intervals called sync frequency as configured by the customer. It also captures updates and deletes to the data in the source Zoom account.Fivetran also allows column blocking which means customers can decide which columns to sync to the warehouse for each table.Column hashing allows customers to hash data in particular columns with sensitive data.

Phonism's cloud-based SaaS solution is the best way to provision, deploy, manage and migrate phone endpoints and instantly expand your TAM (Total Addressable Market) or offer a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) strategy by instantly enabling support for ~250 different device types across many manufacturers.Benefits Integrating Phonism with ZoomZoom Phone users, devices and assignments are mapped and recreated in Phonism.User VoIP credentials and SIP information synchronized from Zoom and used to configure devices to register with Zoom after provisioning.Zoom assets are continuously monitored for changes that affect device configuration and automatically updated.Visibility for all devices across your deployment. In Phonism’s hierarchy, the assets are organized in the same manner as they are in Zoom.This is a two-way integration, phones or users can be created in either Zoom or Phonism.Integrate with existing OSS/BSS via our REST API. Phonism currently supports the following brands: Mitel, Avaya, Polycom, Poly-Obi, Yealink, Grandstream, Cisco, Snom, HTek and Fanvil.Some of the most popular features include:Global Device Management - Configure and provision VoIP devices using a single, unified interface. No need to edit files by hand with a text editor or configure via Web UI.Visual Button / Device Management - Make key customization simple and easy for users or admins with a drag-n-drop graphic representation of your specific device.Templates - Allow admins to configure bulk settings and apply to a single device or across an entire deployment.Firmware Management - Keep devices secure and up-to-date by upgrading software and firmware in just a few clicks.Multi-Tenant Platform - With hierarchy, multi-level organizations for increased admin power and flexibility.

Zluri is a comprehensive SaaS Operations management platform for IT teams. It enables IT teams to discover & manage all SaaS applications used across the organization from a single dashboard. As organizations grow, So do the SaaS applications used by them, and along with grows the complexity in managing the applications. The fact that anyone can sign up for a SaaS app and start using it, Sometimes keeps the IT team unaware of what apps are being in the organization leading to unnecessary spending on redundant applications & unused licenses. Zluri provides an intelligent solution to manage all your software subscriptions.With direct integration with Zoom, you can easily track which users hold Zoom licenses, how frequently they use Zoom & Which features they are using. Reclaim is an intelligent calendar assistant that automatically blocks flexible time for the things that matter to you. With Reclaim's Slack integration, you automatically add Zoom meetings to your meeting invitations from Reclaim, and you can sync your Slack status and Do Not Disturb with events from your calendar without breaking a sweat. By connecting Reclaim to your Zoom account, Reclaim can now sync your Slack status with your Zoom meetings!When you enter a Zoom meeting — even if it's not on your calendar — Reclaim will set your status to "in a meeting" (or whatever you choose) automatically.When you leave a Zoom meeting — even if it ends ahead of time — Reclaim will automatically clear your status and reset it based on your schedule if needed.It's that simple. Shadow Agent adds enhanced functionality to Zoom Phone including disposition codes, account codes, custom auxiliary codes, agent or extension presence, queue status and real time daily leaderboards.Disposition, Activity, or Incident CodesShadow Agent allows users to tag calls with disposition codes or labels that indicate the call type, reason for the call, the outcome of the call, and the required action. The metrics can later be dissected to provide better insights into product stability, customer experience or resource allocation.Auxiliary Codes & Wrap ModeAuxiliary Codes (or AUX codes) are used to track the time a Zoom Phone user has deliberately chosen to not accept calls. Shadow Agent allows for customizable AUX codes such as On Break, Bathroom Break or On Lunch. Timed states can automatically be set for a user after a call. These states are known as Wrap or After Call Work modes.Enhanced Agent / User Presence, Leaderboards Shadow Agent includes a powerful dynamic local presence dashboard that can be configured to show specific queues, departments, or users. Real time leaderboards can highlight user or agent activity and performance. Enterprise Analytics and Call Queue ReportingShadow Agent tightly integrates with Shadow All In One Analytics in the Zoom App Marketplace (link: https://link.telecost.com/shadowa1z) for account level enterprise reporting and real time dashboarding.  Requirements:Zoom Phone Admin Role for ConfigurationFor Browser Users:Chrome, Edge, Safari or Firefox (latest version)Windows Client Users:Windows 10+

PlusThis offers a variety of tools to super charge your marketing automation platform. By linking your Zoom account to your PlusThis account you use PlusThis' Zoom Webinar Connection and Zoom Meeting tools.Zoom Webinar ConnectionPlusThis' Zoom Webinar Connection tool allows you to register contacts from your marketing automation platform for your Zoom webinars. You can store various webinar information (webinar join url, webinar title, and webinar start time) on each registered contact to send your own personalized webinar reminders. You can also add contacts to groups upon registration.After the webinar is completed, the Zoom Webinar Connection tool will store attendance data on all attending contacts (join time, and attendance duration). You can also add your contacts to different groups based on attendance.You can learn more about Zoom Webinar Connection tool configuration here.Zoom MeetingPlusThis' Zoom Meeting tool allows you to create a meeting in Zoom based off a start time stored on the contact record. You can also set the topic, agenda, and duration of the meeting. After creating the meeting, the tool will register that contact for the newly created meeting. You can then store information about the meeting on the contact. Such as, topic, agenda, and join url.Once the meeting is over, this tool will pull attendance information from Zoom so you can add the contact to a specific group based off whether or not they attended.You can learn more about Zoom Meeting tool configuration here.

Many organizations use Zoom tools for both Unified Communications and Telephony. The integration between Genesys Cloud and Zoom brings together two of the world’s best cloud CX and UC products by combining the user experience of both platforms into easy-to-use workflows. The Zoom Phone integration with Genesys Cloud allows organizations to sync directory and contact information into both platforms and enables Genesys Cloud users to see Zoom Phone users’ availability during call transfers. In combination with SIP integration between the platforms, this results in a workflow that provides context and awareness of Zoom user availability prior to handing off interactions and better resolution for end customers. The Zoom Meetings integration with Genesys Cloud offers the ability to post and join Zoom Meeting rooms directly within Genesys Cloud, reducing or eliminating the need to copy/paste meeting room links and simplify workflows for on-demand collaboration. Genesys Cloud users will also be able to use the ‘/zoom’ command in Genesys Cloud’s Collaborate Chat to post their own personal Zoom URL into a 1-1 or group chat room.  For more information on connecting Zoom to your Genesys Cloud org, please see Genesys Cloud documentation.

Zoom meeting accounts can be connected with Schoox personal profiles. Thus, managers can use their own personal Zoom meeting account to organize Live Sessions in their Academy. After the creation of an event, if it should be visible to the whole academy, it should be turned to public. Only admins and training managers with the right to edit events, can make an event private or public. A public event will be visible to the academy, or to a particular group of people when added in a category with enabled access permissions. Users with admin rights can upload an excel file and register users to an event on the Register Users page. Also members can self-register to events. Live Sessions can then be initiated with Zoom meeting. This event will automatically be created on Zoom meeting account and all registrants will automatically be synced in Zoom meeting. Then, the event can be started from Schoox by those having the relevant permission. Registered users can join from Schoox. Once the event completed, registrants’ progress will be synced from Zoom meeting to Schoox.

Download ZoomISO from https://liminalet.com/zoomisoZoomISO breaks down a Zoom call into its constituent audio and video components so that you can put it back together in a professionally branded and customized production. This macOS application generates individual audio and video outputs of the participants in a Zoom Meeting or Webinar, allowing you to easily re-composite them inside of a vision mixer, switcher, or media server. ZoomISO supports a variety of output formats for popular production systems, and can export HD video in supported Zoom calls. Output formats for audio and video include NDI from Vizrt Group, SDI from BlackMagic Design's Desktop Video suite, Metal Syphon, Physical Displays, Dante Virtual Soundcard, Loopback, Black Hole, and more! ZoomISO Advanced Audio allows you to route Isolated Audio from Zoom participants to any multichannel audio driver on your system with built-in meters and gain controls. You can also leverage Embedded Output Audio to quickly get ISO audio into your AV chain. Dive into advanced settings and workflows to build the exact system to meet your production's needs! ZoomISO wraps around the popular ZoomOSC API, which powers integrations with third party interfaces including BitFocus Companion, Isadora, and Universe Control. Ensure scalability, maximize performance, and gain full control of your remote contribution system from a central interface with ZoomISO. ZoomISO was created by Liminal Entertainment Technologies, LLC and is now owned and operated by Zoom Video Communications, Inc.

Phreesia gives healthcare organizations a suite of robust applications to manage the patient intake process. Before the visit, the patient is scheduled for a telehealth appointment 2. The patient receives an email or text to pre-register & sign consents 3. Phreesia prompts the patient to click a link to enter a virtual waiting room or is shown how to start the session

What does RevenueHero do ?RevenueHero is a tool for effective scheduling of meetings. When a prospect visits a website and tries to talk to sales, there is a lot of back and forth involved to find a good time to schedule a meeting. RevenueHero eliminates this tedious process and accelerates scheduling of meetings from websites. This gives a delightful experience for the prospect as well as the sales person.RevenueHero powers the various workflows and rules that are involved in scheduling these meetings. Consider a company selling to small businesses as well as enterprise businesses. When a prospect visits the company's website and fills up a form, it is important that the right team or person talks to them. RevenueHero allows marketing teams to define rules that say - "if prospect has < 500 employees, schedule meetings with SMB team" and "if prospect has > 500 employees, schedule meetings with the Enterprise team". This is how RevenueHero typically works. Company onboards their Sales team onto RevenueHeroThe sales people connect their calendars and conferencing tool i.e. Zoom to RevenueHero.The marketing ops people define the rules and workflows that determine who gets a meeting. Once defined, the RevenueHero snippet is copied and installed on the website through which prospects try to book a meeting.With the snippet enabled, customers can find the best time slots for them to talk to sales.RevenueHero records these meetings and uses Zoom APIs to generate and send meeting links to customers through email.At the time of the meeting, customers can simply click these links and join the meeting with the Sales agents.TURN MORE INBOUND LEADS INTO MEETINGS WITH REVENUEHERO

GoMe.ai helps improve communication and collaboration within your team. After each meeting, GoMe.ai gives each participant a comprehensive analysis and recommendations based on observable communication patterns, such as tone, speech rate, interruptions, curiosity, dominance, judgment, usage of filler words, etc. GoMe.ai learns about your tendencies and provides private and individualized feedback so that you and your team can have more effective meetings.GoMe.ai only provides analysis for meetings that meet the following criteria:The meeting must have more than one participant.The Zoom meeting must have been recorded and transcribed.Zoom Meeting transcript must be available within 3 days after the scheduled meeting date.Pre-meeting recommendations are only available if the Zoom meeting was also scheduled using a Google or Microsoft calendar and criteria 1 is met. At Squire, our purpose is to empower recruitment agencies to focus on candidate interactions, not manual note-taking. Our Zoom integration revolutionizes your recruitment process, extracting crucial information from screening calls, summarizing the data, and updating each candidate's record in your ATS. Trust Squire, a leader in conversation intelligence for the recruitment industry, to transform your Zoom conversations into high-quality, actionable insights, and to elevate your recruitment efficiency.The process is straightforward, connect your Zoom account to Squire with the click of one button in the Squire app - www.squireapp.io - and be able to utilise Squire in both Zoom video calls and Zoom phone calls. Zoom Video Calls﻿Open up the Squire app in your Zoom video call, log in with your Squire credentials and get access to the value of Squire. You can enter the name, email, and phone number of the candidate you are interviewing, and select the role you are interviewing them for from a dropdown menu - this will show you the list of questions that are applicable to that role and once you've completed the call, Squire will transcribe and process the recording, seamlessly updating the candidate record in your applicant tracking system (ATS). Zoom Phone CallsThe Zoom phone calls are really magical. In the Squire web app, you will need to select a "default role" for phone calls, in the settings page when you are logged in. Once the default role has been selected, and you've logged in to the Squire app in your Zoom account, then you simply conduct your phone calls like usual. Squire picks up the recording, passes the information through our processing and boom, out comes perfect candidate notes, updated directly into your applicant tracking system. Important Note. To use Squire with Zoom Video Calls, you must have either a Pro, Business or Enterprise Zoom account. To use Squire with Zoom Phone Calls, you must have either a Business or Enterprise Zoom account.

appName: Team Drive for Zoom by Splain
description: Google Team Drive is a shared space for teams to manage their content and is available to all G-Suite users. Unlike Google Drive (My Drive), files in Team Drive belongs to the team instead of individual user.  Splain.io has developed this app to unify all of your Zoom meeting recordings/transcripts into Team Drive. Unlike the Google Drive app, this connector is installed at the account level by the admin and will be effective for all users in the account without the end user needing to install the app. Once installed by the account admin, this app will take the meeting, webinar and in-meeting recordings / chat transcripts and move it to your Team Drive account. The users cannot be selectively enabled or disabled. All of the cloud recordings in your account (for all users) will be moved into Team Drive. Please also note that the recordings will be moved from the time this app is fully installed in your account.ReportingSplain provides a complete report of your transfers. You can select "Manage" option under the app and select "Configure" to check the reports or set the features.LicensingThis connector comes with a 3 days free trial and pricing start from $5.99 per user/month*. * Please visit https://splain.io for more details or contact customer service - support@splain.ioPlease contact us (support@splain.io) for a site license or 50+ user licenses.

Please download ZoomCuts from https://liminalet.com/zoomcutsApple provides powerful ways for automation with the Shortcuts app, allowing apps to provide actions that users can then use to create their own custom shortcuts. A shortcut is a fast way to get one or more tasks done. Actions from different applications can be combined to form a shortcut to perform tasks that would be otherwise difficult or impossible to do from one of these individual applications. Users can then interact with these shortcuts with the Shortcuts app or invoke them using SiriZoomCuts exposes many popular and useful commands for hosts and users alike within Shortcuts. ZoomCuts allows users to raise or lower their hand, send in-meeting chat, get a list of participants, join meetings, and much more. Furthermore, ZoomCuts allows users to interact with other third-party applications on macOS that supports Shortcuts, enabling automation workflows that would normally take several seconds or minutes to accomplish manually.Automation increases reliability, giving you the confidence to build meetings and webinars around complicated sequences of events. You can use these frameworks to implement rapid pinning, participant management, automated chat, and other powerful meeting commands into your production flow.

The Myna meeting app instantly turns virtual meetings into actually useful records of exactly what was said and done.With the Zoom integration Myna can take your Zoom cloud recordings and turn them into a SmartTranscript that gets delivered directly to your inbox.Every recording is stored in your choice of cloud storage (like Dropbox) to allow you to keep a permanent record of your meeting. That recording is then turned into a SmartTranscript which is delivered to you by email, so it is fully searchable from your email client, by content, date and participant. You can even keep a copy in your cloud storage so that it can automatically be linked to the meeting in your calendar (requires Outlook plugin).What is a SmartTranscript? Available in English, French, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese, the SmartTranscript not only gives you a transcript of your Zoom meeting, it looks for all of the key things that were said, and identifies them for you so you don't have to read the whole transcript to find what is important. You can quickly search for anything: the system is even smart enough to let you search for common mistrancriptions to find what the speech recognition might have missed.You can add your own custom topics as well as edit the transcript.If you use Zoom transcription already, at your option, we can use this instead.Did you present slides in your meeting? Myna reads all of the content, makes its searchable and produces "SnapTags" of the most important content to get you straight back into the most important part of your meeting.

Participant is an intentionally simple, video-focused Zoom client designed for meeting participants. No sharing, polls, or host features. Participant may not be for you, and that's OK. Use Data Saver to turn off your camera and stop streaming videos. This will reduce your data usage by approximately 60-95% depending on the number of participants.• Put videos in focus – configure columns, focus on active cameras only, or hold and drag to sort it just how you like it.• Threaded chat – Pro users can use threaded chat. No more accidentally responding to everyone when you meant to DM.• Get on the big screen – share to your Apple TV and you have total control of what is shown on the external display.• Zoom in/zoom out – simply tap a video to get a larger view. Tap again to close it.• Control host requests – you control what happens if a host asks to unmute or start your camera: ask, always allow, or automatically allow if your hand is raised.Thanks for giving Participant a try. Let us know what you think.Participant uses the Zoom SDK but is not endorsed, certified, warrantied, or supported by Zoom Video Communications, Inc.

The cost of VRS is paid by a federally administered fund. Accordingly, use of Sorenson VRS for video conferencing is subject to compliance with FCC regulations and Sorenson’s VRS EULA. Zoom webinar accounts can be connected with Schoox personal profiles. Thus, managers can use their own personal Zoom webinar account to organize Live Sessions in their Academy. They can create Live Sessions in their Academy by filling fields such as "Title", "Description", "Category", "External Instructors", "Academy Instructors". Also they can select if the event will be "Invitation based" or "Registration based". Events are created as private by default. After the creation of an event, if it should be visible to the whole academy, it should be turned to public. Only admins and training managers with the right to edit events, can make an event private or public. A public event will be visible to the academy, or to a particular group of people when added in a category with enabled access permissions. Users with admin rights can upload an excel file and register users to an event on the Register Users page. Also members can self-register to events. Live Sessions can then be initiated with Zoom webinar. This event will automatically be created on Zoom webinar account and all registrants will automatically be synced in Zoom webinar. Then, the event can be started from Schoox by those having the relevant permission. Registered users can join from Schoox. Once the event completed, registrants’ progress will be synced from Zoom webinar to Schoox.

They can create Live Sessions in their Academy by filling fields such as "Title", "Description", "Category", "External Instructors", "Academy Instructors". Also they can select if the event will be "Invitation based" or "Registration based". Events are created as private by default. After the creation of an event, if it should be visible to the whole academy, it should be turned to public. Only admins and training managers with the right to edit events, can make an event private or public. A public event will be visible to the academy, or to a particular group of people when added in a category with enabled access permissions. Users with admin rights can upload an excel file and register users to an event on the Register Users page. Also members can self-register to events. Live Sessions can then be initiated with Zoom webinar. This event will automatically be created on Zoom webinar account and all registrants will automatically be synced in Zoom webinar. Then, the event can be started from Schoox by those having the relevant permission. Registered users can join from Schoox. Once the event completed, registrants’ progress will be synced from Zoom webinar to Schoox.

Please download ZoomOSC from https://www.liminalet.com/zoomoscMaximize your control of virtual meetings and events with ZoomOSC, an expanded version of the Zoom client that integrates Zoom with third-party software and hardware.ZoomOSC uses the OSC (Open Sound Control) protocol to receive commands and control the Zoom client. In addition, the application provides OSC output for meeting status, participant data, gallery order/position, chat messages, and more.ZoomOSC allows you to integrate Zoom into countless third-party software and hardware workflows. This app exposes Zoom meeting features like pinning, spotlighting, video on/off, screensharing and more through OSC messaging. This enables you to use OSC applications and hardware to create custom control surfaces for Zoom. Create your own or try out some community made integrations!ZoomOSC provides real-time OSC output for participant actions (ie. muting, raising hand) as well as meeting status information. With this data, integrators can drive functions with participant usernames, gallery positions, active speakers, and more.Automation increases reliability, giving you the confidence to build shows around complicated sequences of events. You can use these frameworks to implement rapid pinning, participant management, automated chat, and other powerful meeting commands into your production flow.This application was created by Liminal Entertainment Technologies, LLC, and is now owned and operated by Zoom Video Communications, Inc.

Zoom is integrated into the Jellyzone diary so that a user can generate either an email to be sent to patients that contains a link to join the zoom call or for the user to actually host (join) a call at the given time.To get started, each goes to "My profile" and press the "Zoom auth" button. This will set that user up with theirown Zoom account.To use Zoom on a daily basis, right click on any appointment in the diary and select either "Email zoom link" to send an email to the patient that contains a button to join a call. Or press Start Zoom call to start that appointment directly.Although a clinician's diary will be full of appointments, nothing is added to Zoom until either an email is generated that contains a join link or the clinician activately starts the call.If the appointment is deleted from the Jelly diary, the corresponding Zoom meeting is deleted if it existed. Currently the ZoomNet  library doesn't support updating the zoom meeting if the appointment date/time was amended.Likewise, if a user logs into their Zoom account and amends the start/end time of a meeting this will be reflected in Jelly. If the meeting is deleted in Zoom, the corresponding appointment in Jelly is also cancelled.When the meeting starts & ends as well as when participants join/ leave the meeting are recorded in an audit log on Jelly for auditing.

This can be done manually by entering the associated Zoom userID in the Video Conference User ID field on your profile page at https://lstmonitor.com/WebPages/MyProfileView.aspx and saving by clicking the disk icon in the top right corner of the page. You may also choose to leave this field blank and let m.Care assign the Zoom user automatically when joining your first meeting. With this method, m.Care will check if a user exists in your Zoom account with an email matching the user ID of your m.Care account. Five9 has partnered with Zoom to provide a tighter integration between Five9 CCaaS and Zoom UCaaS solutions through a Five9 Zoom UC Adapter. This solution provides the following features: 1. Five9 agents enjoy a consolidated view of the address book which now contains, in addition to Five9 agents, all the Zoom contacts in the enterprise which have been assigned a phone number. This feature works on the native Five9 Agent Desktop Plus (ADP) UI as well as all the Five9 CRM adapters using Agent Desktop Toolkit+ (ADT+) UI.  2. Five9 agents can view the real-time presence status of their Zoom contacts at-a-glance right from their address book.3. Simple one click-to-call enables Five9 agents to initiate an Agent-Expert-Consultation call. This can be a transfer, consultation call with a Zoom contact, or a conference call including the Zoom contact and the customer.  This increases First Call Resolution by providing the agent easy access to back office subject matter experts and thereby increases customer satisfaction and loyalty.4. Five9 Zoom UC Adapter can be easily installed from the Zoom App Marketplace.Note: For Five9 customers hosted in UK, use Five9-UK app.

⭐️ Main Features ⭐️

1. Record and transcribe meetings in real-time

Airgram will record Zoom, Google Meet, or MS Teams meeting video and audio in high-quality.

Get Well is a global digital health company with more than 20 years of experience improving patient engagement. Through partnerships with some of the most progressive hospitals and health systems in the world, Get Well uses digital technology to improve the healthcare experience for patients, their families, and clinicians. Get Well is leading the movement towards a more collaborative and participatory patient and family experience. 

As a patient receiving care in a hospital, individuals are not always able to visit with the people they love and care about. The care process is enriched by the participation of a patient’s loved ones. Being able to see them and talk to them while the patient is treated or is recovering in the hospital provides incalculable benefits to a patient’s well-being.

In the spirit of one of Get Well’s core tenets of  leading patients toward a more participatory and family experience, Get Well’s Zoom video conferencing capability connects the patient to friends and family through Zoom solutions deployed directly into the hospital room by clicking and entering a phone number or email address. 

Patients can now add family members and friends into the care process by including them in important conversations with their care team. Patients in isolation as well as younger patients with siblings that are not able to visit the hospital can now communicate with their loved ones face to face through Zoom and Get Well’s shared technology.

Bringing together the powerful tools Zoom and Get Well offer, patients are given effective mechanisms to enrich their hospital stay experience; family and friends are provided channels into supporting their loved one during a trying time, and hospital staff are given additional tools to enhance the healing care their patients need.

Zscaler Digital Experience For Government Integration allows you to monitor actual one-to-one calls or meetings among two or more participants in a configured Zoom tenant. The ZDX Score for Call Quality can reflect either a Mean Opinion Score (MOS) average, or metric thresholds for latency, jitter, and packet loss. Call Quality works in parallel with ZDX cloud path probes and device metrics and events to help you identify issues that are unique to a device or the network.Call Quality data is retrieved using the Zoom API, and data is captured in real time as a meeting is in progress. User and device information garnered from the API for call participants is mapped to ZDX users and devices. Note: this app only works with Zscaler ZDX Government cloud (ZDXGov.net)

Laxis is not another transcriber. It is the next generation of AI-fueled meeting assistants, and it integrates directly with your Zoom account. Beyond just transcription, it provides the ability for you to create personalized templates that capture the exact information you need, in a format you can use. It also helps you organize, prioritize and analyze insights across all your meetings, interviews, and other types of Zoom-based get-togethers. This is a very powerful feature for product managers, UX researchers, industry analysts and anyone who does a lot of research interviews.This integration includes three major capabilities:Post-meeting transcript: After every Zoom meeting, you can import the recording into Laxis to get a highly accurate transcript.Personalized meeting templates: Setup your own template with topics and keywords to create consistent records. Auto-generated key quotes: Laxis’ AI extracts the key information based on your template, topic and key words. Capture the exact wording from a customer or business partner for future reference, or edit the notes as you see fit.Conversation insight management: Laxis extracts and organizes the quotations and helps you identify key insights across all your conversations. To set up, you need a Zoom Pro account or above that supports cloud storage of your recordings. Please go to https://laxis.tech/ to register.

Egnyte for Zoom connector helps enterprises to unify their Zoom meeting/webinar recordings and transcriptions into a single Egnyte repository.  This is a paid app after the free trial.Once the connector is authorized by each end user, all the cloud recording content will be auto pulled into Splain connector platform and uploaded to the end user selected Egnyte folders. It typically takes few minutes for the recording to be available from Zoom but the transfer will begin immediately. This is a user level app and that means each end user in your account needs to install this connector.  Ask your account admin to pre-approve this connector before installing. Setup ProcessAuthorize the connector - enter your Zoom and Egnyte credentials during the setup processChoose your Egnyte folder when prompted Splain will create a "Zoom Recording" folder under your selected Egnyte folderAll your cloud recordings will be available under this folder. For each meeting or webinar, this connector will create a sub folder that starts with the subject for your meeting or webinar. All the audio/video/transcription files will be available under this sub folder. Please also note that the recordings will be moved from the time this app is fully installed in your account. ReportingSplain provides a complete report of your transfers. You can select "Manage" option under the app and select "Configure" to check the reports or set the features.LicensingThis connector comes with a 3 day free trial and pricing starts with $7.99 per user/month*.  * Please visit https://splain.io for more details or contact customer service - support@splain.io

appName: SaaS Security API for Zoom - AUS
description: SaaS Security API for Zoom (AUS) Palo Alto Networks SaaS Security API is a security solution that connects to your sanctioned SaaS application using the SaaS application’s API. This API integration enables the service to discover and scan all assets retroactively when you first connect there Zoom app instance with the SaaS application. SaaS Security API scans and analyzes all your Zoom assets and applies policy to identify exposures, external collaborators, risky user behavior, and sensitive documents and identifies the potential risks associated with each asset.SaaS Security API also performs deep content inspection and protects both your historical assets and new assets from malware, data exposure, and data exfiltration. As SaaS Security API identifies incidents, you can assess them and define automated actions to eliminate or close the incident.

Werewolf is a fun interactive party game for you to play with your friends and family while using Zoom Meetings! You can start the game from within your meeting and easily control the screen area of the game and the other participants’ videos. Players are separated into two groups: the villagers and the werewolves. The villagers' goal is to find out the werewolves' identity whereas werewolves are trying to stay as inconspicuous as possible to overrun the village. The werewolves must hide their dark role and act as regular villagers.Every night, werewolves select and eat one poor villager. When the morning rises, that player is off the game, but can still observe. The villagers’ mission is to discuss and investigate who might be werewolves among them. Every player (even the werewolves) selects one other villager whom they think is a werewolf and votes for them. After everyone has voted, the person with the most votes is exiled and is off the game. The exiled person may or may not be the werewolf, which is not revealed yet.After the exiling, the game continues with the same pattern: the night sets up again and werewolves select their next victim. Once again, one villager is eaten and the next morning, other villagers must discuss and vote for the most potential werewolf among them.The game ends when either the villagers have managed to exile all the werewolves or the werewolves have overrun the village.So gather up your team and have a fun and safe get-together in Zoom!

FlowTeams is a desktop application that reduces interruptions at times of focus, by visualizing your current and upcoming focus to your team members. That way, whenever they need to ask you a question, they will know if now is a good moment to interrupt, and if not, when later will be a more opportune moment. Thus, you can ideally focus for longer durations with less interruptions, while at the same time, effectively interact and collaborate with your team.Learn more about the research project, developed by the Human Aspects of Software Engineering Lab at the University of Zurich, Switzerland here: http://hasel.dev/flowteamsWhy use the Zoom Connector for FlowTeams?FlowTeams allows you to connect to the most frequently used communication apps, including Microsoft Teams, Zoom and Slack. Connecting to these apps will allow you to sync the presence status of these apps to FlowTeams (e.g. online, away, in-meeting, in-call), so you'll need to change your Flow Status less frequently manually. Of course, you are free to chose which apps you want to connect and which status sync you want to allow.The following website explains how to connect your Zoom account to FlowTeams: https://flowteams.ifi.uzh.ch/documents/documentation#commu-app-zoomNote 1: Only your current Zoom Presence Status is accessed by FlowTeams, and only locally, so it is not sent to the FlowTeams server.Note 2: The IT department of your organization might have blocked access to these connectors by default. Contact us to receive instructions for the IT department to approve FlowTeams.

appName: Sticky - the AI assistant for all of your meetings
description:
What is Sticky?Streamline your meeting workflow and boost productivity with Sticky, your personal AI meeting assistant. While some apps are designed for meeting organizers, Sticky is for the rest of us who participate in many meetings everyday.
The Sticky AI Notetaker joins your meetings to create concise summaries, action items, and searchable transcripts. The Sticky Workspace organizes your meetings, notes, and action items in one place. Turn action items into tasks and prioritize them in one place. Add AI-suggested or hand-typed action items from your notes to your Sticky task list. No more copying them over into task management or to do apps.

Turn your underused video recordings into an active resource hub your employees can actually use.Internal company events: Keep employees up to date through recordings in an accessible, centralized location.Collaboration: Build team repositories that can be instantly searched to keep institutional knowledge secure and circulating.Training and onboarding: Help employees jump straight to the instructions they’re looking for.Sales calls: Build accountability and track action items with searchable call recordings.External events and webinars: Get more ROI with VOD portals for the recordings that are easier to search, sponsor, and monetize.To activate, contact your AnyClip customer success manager.

THE SAAS SECURITY BLIND SPOT PUTS YOU AT RISKOrganizations are dynamic. Employees come and go. Roles change. As a result, you face a constant battle securing corporate data from those that shouldn’t have access.Some companies use a single sign-on (SSO) technology to track and enforce security access. But SSO only works for the systems to which it’s connected. Most organizations don't deploy SSO for all their SaaS vendors – especially when Shadow SaaS is rampant and employees are using unauthorized SaaS apps. What's more, many organizations grant access privileges to users outside their SSO processes.This security blind spot can expose you to the theft of proprietary data. And it can open you to enormous regulatory compliance risks. GDPR, for example, requires you to understand which systems contain personally identifiable data, and who has access. With the Flexera SaaS Manager Slack integration you will be able to get detailed usage and cost data by internal user segment, Allocate SaaS investments by the department for financial reporting, Identify users logging into Slack that are no longer active, See users that have not been actively using their Slack license to reclaim these licenses for other users and have visibility into your usage and entitlements to easily validate your investment to help your renewal process by providing the data to clearly show "how many licenses you need", not just how many you have.

Planning PokerRun SCRUM planning meetings with ease inside Zoom!FeaturesCreate instant voting rooms and invite others in the Zoom meetingVote collaboratively, find consensus easilySet up custom card sets that match your SCRUM setupPrepare issues to vote on in advance & manage voting orderCustomize your voter avatarPlanning projects is difficult, especially when you are working remotely. The usual SCRUM setup must be familiar to many software engineers — planning meetings, stand-ups, and retros. During a planning meeting, teams estimate projects/cards while sitting around a table and showing hands-on the count of three. This worked well before the pandemic, but it's not so efficient in the remote world. It's no longer easy to tell what the consensus is and it is easy to mess up the countdown and fall victim to bias by seeing other teammates’ votes before revealing your own.This app moves the planning meeting into your Zoom window, allowing you to vote and find consensus easily.What is planning poker?Planning poker, also called SCRUM poker or pointing poker, is a consensus-based, gamified technique for estimating, mostly used to estimate the effort or relative size of development goals in software development. In planning poker, members of the group make estimates by playing numbered cards face-down to the table, instead of speaking them aloud. The cards are revealed, and the estimates are then discussed. By hiding the figures in this way, the group can avoid the cognitive bias of anchoring, where the first number spoken aloud sets a precedent for subsequent estimates.
